org.apache.streams.instagram.api

Class InstagramOAuthRequestSigner

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.streams.instagram.api.InstagramOAuthRequestSigner

  • public class InstagramOAuthRequestSigner
extends Object
    Handles request signing to api.instagram.com.
    See Also:
    https://www.instagram.com/developer/secure-api-requests/
